messages.message: Hi team, I'm testing out Flash in sandbox and my project won't compile. Is there a known issue with the sandbox?
happening across all my build projects in the sandbox

The sandbox tends to be rather unstable, just due to the development nature of it.  I run into problems like this quite frequently that end up working if I try again later.

@david.lee if you try again now does it work?

Actually, I was just recently trying to update an app, and it is still doing this for me as well.  So perhaps this is a longer lived problem than the general instability of the Sandbox.  <!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> can someone look into why we cannot save apps in the Sandbox?
I think <!subteam^S05BKH20B4K> would be better suited to debug product issue?

Try retrying, looks like during the time of compilation execution was going on, seeing a couple of unavailability errors. Although even now I see a lot of services unavailable. @sitaram Can you help take a look at that?

Also, as a practice @david.lee @Nathaniel, its better to test out new features on aihub-uat, that's generally in a much more stable state in terms of the infra as well as the product features than the sandbox.
yes, will take a look in some time, debugging saas deployment pipeline related issue which is higher priority
